candle_art.title: Aromatic Lavender Candle
candle_art.details: A handcrafted candle made with natural soy wax and scented with pure lavender essential oils. Perfect for relaxation and creating a calming atmosphere.

rasin_art.title: Ocean Wave Resin Coasters
rasin_art.details: Set of four beautiful coasters with a stunning ocean wave effect created with epoxy resin. Protects your furniture in style.
